channel.title: Tools on Teiid
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Teiid

item.title: Beetle Studio
item.description: Beetle Studio is a browser-based visual tool that enables rapid, model-driven definition, integration, management and testing your data services. Connect to your sources, define the views and the source data you want to access in your applications and create data services

item.title: Teiid Designer
item.description: Teiid Designer is a visual tool built for Eclipse, that enables rapid, model-driven definition, integration, management and testing your VDBs using the Teiid runtime framework. Download and Install User Guide - HTML | HTML Single | PDF User Guide Table Of Contents Version 11.1.2 Copyright Â© 2018 Red Hat, Inc. Legal Notice Table of Contents (abbreviated) Introduction Dive Right In! Server Management New Model Wizards Importers Creating and Editing Model Objects Metadata-specific Modeling User Defined Functions Editing Models and Projects Managing VDBs Testing Your Models Materialization Support Searching Appendices Supported Data Sources Designer Metadata Usage Requirements In Teiid Runtime User Preferences UI Reference
